text.p1: I'm a passionate Software Engineer with a strong focus on system design, 3D printing, and embedded systems. I thrive on solving complex problems and bringing ideas to life through code and hardware.
text.p2: From building web applications and designing custom firmware for microcontrollers, to crafting prototypes by 3D printing, I love creating innovative solutions that blend digital and physical worlds.

cruze.description: Cruze is an app that connects colleagues by helping them discover each other's commutes, making it easier to share rides to and from work. With Cruze, you can find fellow commuters, save time, reduce costs, and contribute to a more sustainable daily routine.
